item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, November 15, 2024 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Biological Miracle – Wood Frog (86 points | 16 comments)
2. Maybe Bluesky Has "Won" (13 points | 3 comments)
3. Show HN: Free mortgage analysis tool to avoid getting screwed by closing costs (73 points | 22 comments)
4. Seer: A GUI front end to GDB for Linux (228 points | 139 comments)
5. Show HN: Scooter – Interactive find and replace in the terminal (73 points | 37 comments)
6. The Battle Line at Louvain (94 points | 55 comments)
7. Show HN: OnAir – create link, receive calls (164 points | 67 comments)
8. Pex: A tool for generating .pex (Python EXecutable) files, lock files and venvs (39 points | 10 comments)
9. Gliimly is a programming language for web services (17 points | 8 comments)
10. Building LawStar – a year long indie hacking journey (40 points | 19 comments)
11. Thomas E. Kurtz has died (346 points | 88 comments)
12. MomBoard: E-ink display for a parent with amnesia (1773 points | 221 comments)
13. Incorporation of photosynthetically active algal chloroplasts in mammalian cells (12 points | 6 comments)
14. Ask HN: How do you communicate in a remote startup? (14 points | 9 comments)
15. FBDetect: Catching Tiny Performance Regressions at Hyperscale [pdf] (44 points | 17 comments)
16. Go-taskflow: A taskflow-like General-purpose Task-parallel Programming Framework (14 points | 1 comment)
17. Upcoming Hardening in PHP (293 points | 116 comments)
18. Something weird is happening with LLMs and chess (585 points | 397 comments)
19. Chemist Identifies Mystery 'Blobs' Washing Up in Newfoundland (22 points | 6 comments)
20. Modern Treasury (YC S18) Is Hiring a Product Designer ( | hide)
21. Norwegian fishermen hunting for halibut caught a US nuclear sub (91 points | 62 comments)
22. Installed an open source garage door opener, and I'm loving it (4 points | discuss)
23. Speculations on arenas and custom strings in C++ (31 points | 4 comments)
24. Manual for PUB (a markup language in 1971) – Larry Tesler (56 points | 11 comments)
25. First generation and control of skyrmions at room temperature in a 2D material (11 points | discuss)
26. Please stop the coding challenges (165 points | 333 comments)
27. SNES and Playstation Cubic Adpcm Interpolation (31 points | 8 comments)
28. Virality in cartography: What makes a map go viral? (53 points | 14 comments)
29. The cochlear implant question (49 points | 92 comments)
30. The letter ℘: name and origin? (2017) (269 points | 128 comments)
